articles.title: European club set to table serious offer for Chiefs’ Ngcobo - The Citizen
articles.description: The team is said to have already been making inquiries about the defender.
articles.content:
A European side has reignited their interest in Kaizer Chiefs defender Njabulo Ngcobo and could make a juicy offer for him in the next transfer window.
